Hi All,
I'm doing test cases for some server components that run in tomcat =
and
that perform datasource lookup. 
Currently I'm using simple-jndi withou=
t issue, but I saw there is also
a MockContext provided by mockEJB...

Are =
there other libraries that provided a simple context usable in a
testing en=
vironment ?

What do you think about simple-jndi vs MockEJB ? (note that I'=
m not
interesting in ejb)

Cheers,
